name: Staunch Shoes
description: Simplicity and angled design make boots users believe that their will grows stronger.

name: Staunch Shoes [1]
description: Simplicity and angled design make boots users believe that their will grows stronger.

name: Steam Goblin Bag
description: The clockwork spring is winding around the spring box. The main transmission gear is in circular shape. After being ignited, the machine will make a loud mechanical sound which is very upbeat! That's the technology! We're so proud!

name: Steam Goblin Bag Blueprint
description: The clockwork spring is winding around the spring box. The main transmission gear is in circular shape. After being ignited, the machine will make a loud mechanical sound which is very upbeat! That's the technology! We're so proud!

name: Steel
description: After soaking the iron a few times, a special potion can make it stronger, Granting the manufactured weapon or armor higher hardness.

name: Steel Battle Axe
description: A military axe made of durable steel.

name: Steel Battle Axe [2]
description: A military axe made of durable steel.

name: Steel Ice
description: Ice drink added with strength fortifier, the soft taste is much impressive. Eating it decreases all magic damage you suffer to 1 point, the effect lasts 8 seconds. All ice drinks share 1-min CD, and can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Steel Staff
description: A steel staff. It has good conductivity when releasing certain magic.

name: Steel Staff [2]
description: A steel staff. It has good conductivity when releasing certain magic.

name: Steel Sword
description: The long Sword made of fine steel is with a massive handfeel.

name: Steel Sword [2]
description: The long Sword made of fine steel is with a massive handfeel.
